<script>
  (function() {

    window.BZFD.Config.enhanced = (function() {
      if (location.search.match("nojs")) {
        return false;
      }

      
      if ('MutationObserver' in window) {

        
        if (navigator.userAgent.match(/iphone|ipad|ipod/i)) {

          
          return 'content' in document.createElement('template')
        }
        return true;

      }
    }());

    if (window.BZFD.Config.enhanced) {
      document.documentElement.classList.remove('core-ux');
      document.documentElement.classList.add('enhanced-ux');
    } else {

    }

  }());

<script>
  (function() {

    
    var originalBfStatic = {
      bf_env: 'prod',
      static_root: '/static-assets',
      web_root: 'https://www.buzzfeed.com',
      base_url: 'https://www.buzzfeed.com',
      pound_enabled: true,
    };

    

    
      originalBfStatic.campaignid = 4604614;
    


    if (!('Proxy' in window)) {
      window.BF_STATIC = originalBfStatic;
      return;
    }

    var prox = {
      get: function(target, name) {
        window.bfa('track/website/instrumentation', {
          data: {
            target: 'bf_static',
            value: name
          },
          opts: {
            samplingRate: 0.01
          }
        });
        return originalBfStatic[name];
      }
    }

    window.BF_STATIC = new Proxy({}, prox);

  }());
</script>

    var createScript = function(options) {
      var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
      var script = document.createElement('script');
      script.type = 'text/javascript';
      script.async = false;
      script.src = options.src;
      script.onerror = function() {
        
        
          var chunkName = options.src
            .split('/')
            .filter(function(path) { return /\.js$/.test(path); })
            .map(function(filename) { return filename.split('.')[0]; })[0];

          (new Image()).src = 'https://pixiedust.buzzfeed.com/v1.gif?source=buzz_web&platform=bpager&target=chunk&value=timeout&type=instrumentation&tags=' + JSON.stringify({ chunk_name: chunkName });
        
      };

      if (typeof options.callback === 'function') {
        script.addEventListener('load', options.callback);
      }

      
      head.appendChild(script, head);
    };

    
    window.BZFD.Util = window.BZFD.Util || {};
    window.BZFD.Util.createScript = createScript;

  }());
</script>

<header class="buzz-header xs-mb3" data-bfa="@l:Header;" data-module="buzz-header">
<hgroup class="buzz-header__hgroup xs-my2 md-mt1">
<h1 class="buzz-title xs-mb1 ">
          Justin Bieber Messaged A Gym About A Woman And People Are Shook
        </h1>
<p class="buzz-dek xs-mb1 md-mb2 ">
          What did you mean, Justin?
        </p>
<div class="buzz-timestamp js-timestamp js-unsupported-fallback text-gray-lightest xs-text-6 nowrap xs-mb1 " data-module="timestamp">

    
    

    Originally posted on
    <time class="buzz-timestamp__time js-timestamp__time" data-unix="1502633339">
      August 13, 2017, 14:08 GMT
    </time>
</div>
<div class="buzz-timestamp js-timestamp js-unsupported-fallback text-gray-lightest xs-text-6 nowrap xs-mb1 " data-module="timestamp">

    
    

    Updated on
    <time class="buzz-timestamp__time js-timestamp__time" data-unix="1502638566">
      August 13, 2017, 15:36 GMT
    </time>
</div>
</hgroup>

</span>

<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622025"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">This is 22-year-old Jessica Gober from Savannah, Georgia.</span>
</h3>

    "id": 11622025

<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">Gober is employed at Fitness on Broughton, a gym, where she works at the front desk. She's also a fitness and nutrition coach.</span>

<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-instagram xs-mb4 xs-relative " data-module="embed-instagram">
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">She told BuzzFeed that she had been talking to her colleagues about posting more on the gym's Instagram, so they posted a Boomerang of Gober with an energy drink.</span>
</h3>
<figure>
<div class="subbuzz__media-container xs-mb1">
<blockquote class="js-instagram__container instagram__container xs-m0 xs-border-none xs-col-12" style="padding-top: 100%;">
<a class="subbuzz__media-link" href="https://instagram.com/p/BXlQ8z-gOu9/" target="_blank">
<img alt="Instagram" class="subbuzz__media-image" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);"/>
<div class="subbuzz__media-cta xs-absolute xs-b0 xs-col-12 xs-p2 xs-text-center text-gray-lighter">
    
      View this photo on Instagram
    
  </div>
</a>
</blockquote>
</div>
<figcaption class="subbuzz__caption">
<span class="subbuzz__attribution js-subbuzz__attribution subbuzz__attribution--standard xs-text-6 xs-block">
<a href="https://go.redirectingat.com?id=74679X1524629&amp;sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.buzzfeed.com%2Fikrd%2Fwhat-do-you-mean&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Finstagram.com%2Fp%2FBXlQ8z-gOu9%2F%23author_fitnessonbroughton&amp;xcust=4604614%7CBFLITE&amp;xs=1" target="_blank">Instagram: @fitnessonbroughton</a>
</span>
</figcaption>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-image xs-mb4 xs-relative xs-mb1" data-module="subbuzz-image">
<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622412"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">And then the gym received a DM from Justin Bieber asking about Gober.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622412
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 177.88%">
<img alt='She said: "We got a notification that said Justin Bieber sent you a message and after opening the message we realized it was really him."' class="subbuzz__media-image js-subbuzz__media js-progressive-image js-pinnable xs-col-12 xs-block" data-bfa="@o:{ignore:[bfaBinder]};" data-crop="177.92" data-mobile-crop="177.88" data-mobile-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17891-1502626866-5.png?resize=990:1761" data-span="1" data-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17891-1502626866-5.png" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="background-image: url(https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17891-1502626866-5.png?resize=990:1761&amp;output-quality=auto&amp;output-format=auto&amp;downsize=360:*);"/>
<div class="action-bar--hover-container js-unsupported" data-module="action-bar-subbuzz">
<ul class="action-bar--hover js-action-bar--hover xs-absolute list-unstyled xs-z3" data-bfa="@l:Subbuzz-Share;">
<li class="action-bar--hover__item sharing-btn--c-facebook">
<a class="bfa-share-btn xs-text-center xs-relative xs-block sharing-btn sharing-btn--c-facebook analyt-share--facebook js-sharing-btn" data-bfa="@a:Share; @d:Facebook; @e:{idx: 5, subbuzzId: 11622412}" data-bfa-network="facebook" data-type="sharing-button" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.buzzfeed.com%2Fikrd%2Fwhat-do-you-mean%3Fsub%3D0_11622412%2311622412" target="_blank" title="Share On facebook">
<span class="icon icon--primary">
<svg>
<title>Share On facebook</title>
      Share On facebook 
      <use xlink:href="#facebook"></use>
</svg>
</span>
<span class="sharing-btn__text">Share</span>
</a>
</li>
<li class="action-bar--hover__item sharing-btn--c-pinterest">
<a class="bfa-share-btn xs-text-center xs-relative xs-block sharing-btn sharing-btn--c-pinterest analyt-share--pinterest js-sharing-btn" data-bfa="@a:Share; @d:Pinterest; @e:{idx: 5, subbuzzId: 11622412}" data-bfa-network="pinterest" data-pin-do="ignore" data-type="sharing-button" href="http://pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.buzzfeed.com%2Fikrd%2Fwhat-do-you-mean%2311622412&amp;media=https%3A%2F%2Fimg.buzzfeed.com%2Fbuzzfeed-static%2Fstatic%2F2017-08%2F13%2F8%2Fasset%2Fbuzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03%2Fsub-buzz-17891-1502626866-5.png&amp;description=And+then+the+gym+received+a+DM+from+Justin+Bieber+asking+about+Gober." target="_blank" title="Share On pinterest">

<div class="subbuzz__description subbuzz__description--standard ">
<p>She said: "We got a notification that said Justin Bieber sent you a message and after opening the message we realized it was really him."</p>
</div>
</div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-image xs-mb4 xs-relative xs-mb1" data-module="subbuzz-image">
<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622415"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">Gober said she was shocked and said: "We were like, how in the world did he see this random post? We only had 70 followers and had posted five times previous to this."</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622415
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 177.88%">
<img alt="Gober said she didn't know what to think and immediately called her mum and boyfriend.&quot;My boyfriend and family basically think the same thing I do, that it is very random and shocking. The fact that it has gone viral is not anything we would have ever expected! Everyone was definitely surprised that a celebrity reached out asking who I was,&quot; she said.She said she was a fan of Bieber when she was younger, but hasn't followed him in the last few years." class="subbuzz__media-image js-subbuzz__media js-progressive-image js-pinnable xs-col-12 xs-block" data-bfa="@o:{ignore:[bfaBinder]};" data-crop="177.92" data-mobile-crop="177.88" data-mobile-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17916-1502627480-16.png?resize=990:1761" data-span="1" data-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17916-1502627480-16.png" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="background-image: url(https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17916-1502627480-16.png?resize=990:1761&amp;output-quality=auto&amp;output-format=auto&amp;downsize=360:*);"/>

<div class="subbuzz__description subbuzz__description--standard ">
<p>Gober said she didn't know what to think and immediately called her mum and boyfriend.</p><p>"My boyfriend and family basically think the same thing I do, that it is very random and shocking. The fact that it has gone viral is not anything we would have ever expected! Everyone was definitely surprised that a celebrity reached out asking who I was," she said.</p><p>She said she was a fan of Bieber when she was younger, but hasn't followed him in the last few years.</p>
</div>
</div>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-tweet xs-mb4" data-module="tweet">
<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622399"></div>

      "id": "895364499091443713",
      "params": {
        "conversation": "none"
      }
    }
  </script>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">She said she screenshotted it immediately and posted it on Twitter. She said she never expected the message to go viral.</span>
</h3>
<figure>
<div class="js-tweet__container">
<blockquote class="subbuzz-tweet__container js-tweet__placeholder xs-border rounded xs-m0 xs-mb1 xs-p0">

</div>

<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622444"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">People said she ruined her chances by tweeting about the message.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622444
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 78.82%">

<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">And she clapped back at those comments by posting photos of her and her boyfriend.</span>
</h3>
<figure>
<div class="js-tweet__container">
<blockquote class="subbuzz-tweet__container js-tweet__placeholder xs-border rounded xs-m0 xs-mb1 xs-p0">
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__tweet xs-p2">
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__byline xs-mb2">
<img alt="I've got everything I need right here 💓" class="subbuzz-tweet__avatar xs-mr1" src="http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/868945712930795521/9SdFWlLS_normal.jpg"/>
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__author">
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__display-name xs-block bold" href="https://twitter.com/jessicagober">Jessi</a>
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__username xs-block xs-text-5" href="https://twitter.com/jessicagober">@jessicagober</a>
</div>
</div>
<p class="subbuzz-tweet__text">I've got everything I need right here 💓</p>
<time class="subbuz-tweet__timestamp xs-my1 xs-text-5 xs-block">
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__created-at" href="https://twitter.com/jessicagober/status/895440124032319488">Thu Aug 10 00:22:16 UTC+0000 2017</a>
</time>
<div class="subbuz-tweet__meta">
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__meta-item subbuzz-tweet__reply xs-ml0" href="https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?in_reply_to=895440124032319488" target="_blank">Reply</a>
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__meta-item subbuzz-tweet__retweet xs-ml1" href="https://twitter.com/intent/retweet?tweet_id=895440124032319488" target="_blank">Retweet</a>
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__meta-item subbuzz-tweet__favorite xs-ml1" href="https://twitter.com/intent/favorite?tweet_id=895440124032319488" target="_blank">Favorite</a>
</div>
</div>
</blockquote>
</div>
<figcaption class="subbuzz__caption">
<div class="subbuzz__description subbuzz__description--standard ">
<p>She said: "I didn't post the pictures of my boyfriend because I thought that Justin Bieber wanted to 'get with me', I posted them in response to everyone commenting that I 'ruined my chances with Justin by tweeting the screenshots'. Either way I didn't want a 'chance' because I am perfectly happy with my boyfriend."</p>
</div>
</figcaption>
</figure>
</div>
<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-image xs-mb4 xs-relative xs-mb1" data-module="subbuzz-image">
<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622396"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">She said she has no clue what Bieber wanted but she doesn't think it's as creepy as people are making it out to be.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622396
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 95.05%">
<img alt="This isn't the first time Bieber has asked who a girl is. In 2015, he posted a photo of a girl on Instagram and asked the public who she was." class="subbuzz__media-image js-subbuzz__media js-progressive-image js-pinnable xs-col-12 xs-block" data-bfa="@o:{ignore:[bfaBinder]};" data-crop="95.04" data-mobile-crop="95.05" data-mobile-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-02/sub-buzz-10507-1502625961-1.jpg?resize=990:941" data-span="1" data-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-02/sub-buzz-10507-1502625961-1.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="background-image: url(https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-02/sub-buzz-10507-1502625961-1.jpg?resize=990:941&amp;output-quality=auto&amp;output-format=auto&amp;downsize=360:*);"/>

<div class="subbuzz__description subbuzz__description--standard ">
<p>This isn't the first time Bieber has asked who a girl is. <a href="https://www.buzzfeed.com/kimberleydadds/this-appears-to-be-justin-biebers-mystery-instagr">In 2015</a>, he posted a photo of a girl on Instagram and asked the public who she was.</p>
</div>

</figure>
</div>
<div class="subbuzz subbuzz-image xs-mb4 xs-relative xs-mb1" data-module="subbuzz-image">
<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622397"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">Gober said she found most of the responses positive but is mainly surprised at how much attention the situation has created.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622397
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 112.22%">
<img alt="She said: &quot;All of the articles that have been posted have been based only on assumptions. We didn't think Justin Bieber was being creepy, the gym did respond to him on Instagram. I don't think he had any inappropriate intentions by simply asking who I was.&quot;" class="subbuzz__media-image js-subbuzz__media js-progressive-image js-pinnable xs-col-12 xs-block" data-bfa="@o:{ignore:[bfaBinder]};" data-crop="112.16" data-mobile-crop="112.22" data-mobile-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17926-1502625972-2.jpg?resize=990:1111" data-span="1" data-src="https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17926-1502625972-2.jpg" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" style="background-image: url(https://img.buzzfeed.com/buzzfeed-static/static/2017-08/13/8/asset/buzzfeed-prod-fastlane-03/sub-buzz-17926-1502625972-2.jpg?resize=990:1111&amp;output-quality=auto&amp;output-format=auto&amp;downsize=360:*);"/>

<div class="subbuzz__description subbuzz__description--standard ">
<p>She said: "All of the articles that have been posted have been based only on assumptions. We didn't think Justin Bieber was being creepy, the gym did respond to him on Instagram. I don't think he had any inappropriate intentions by simply asking who I was."</p>

<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">And one tried to slide into his DMs</span>
</h3>
<figure>
<div class="js-tweet__container">
<blockquote class="subbuzz-tweet__container js-tweet__placeholder xs-border rounded xs-m0 xs-mb1 xs-p0">
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__tweet xs-p2">
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__byline xs-mb2">
<img alt="😂😂 hes gonna block me" class="subbuzz-tweet__avatar xs-mr1" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/890687039171112961/lrtQg5le_normal.jpg"/>
<div class="subbuzz-tweet__author">
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__display-name xs-block bold" href="https://twitter.com/BiebsDarker">🎈</a>
<a class="subbuzz-tweet__username xs-block xs-text-5" href="https://twitter.com/BiebsDarker">@BiebsDarker</a>
</div>
</div>
<p class="subbuzz-tweet__text">😂😂 hes gonna block me</p>
<time class="subbuz-tweet__timestamp xs-my1 xs-text-5 xs-block">

</time>

<div class="subbuzz-anchor" id="11622456"></div>
<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">But mainly fans are shook.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622456
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 69.08%">

<h3 class="subbuzz__title xs-mb1 bold">
<span class="js-subbuzz__title-text">She said the gym did respond to Bieber with her Instagram handle.</span>
</h3>
<script type="text/x-config">
  {
    "id": 11622454
    
    
    
  }
</script>
<figure class="subbuzz__media">
<div class="js-full-size-image subbuzz__media--full-width-container">
<div class="js-unsupported-fallback subbuzz__media-container js-progressive-image-container xs-mb05 subbuzz__media-container--small-margin-bottom" style="padding-top: 65.49%">

<script>
  (function(g, d) {

    if(!g.Config) return;

    // Inject pound script
    g.Util.createScript({
      src: 'https://webappstatic.buzzfeed.com/static/compiled/pound.js',
      callback: function() {
        if (g.App) {
          g.App.getService('pound').init();
        }
      }
    });
  })(window.BZFD || {}, document);
</script>
<script>
  (function() {
    if (!window.BZFD.Config.enhanced) {
      
      window.BZFD.Util.createScript({
          src: "/static-assets/js/vendor.0d631be81c20a9c48f90.js"
      });
    }

    
    window.BZFD.Util.createScript({
      src: "/static-assets/js/bfa.95a743552aefc8f834d3.js"
    });

  }());
</script>
<script>
  (function() {

    if (!window.BZFD.Config.enhanced) {
      return;
    };

    window.BZFD.Util = window.BZFD.Util || {};

    window.BZFD.Util.setupProgressiveImages = function(parent) {
      

      parent = parent || document;
      var containers = parent.querySelectorAll('.js-progressive-image-container');
      for (var i = 0; i < containers.length; ++i) {
        var container = containers[i];
        var image = container.querySelector('img.js-progressive-image');
        if (!image) {
          continue;
        }
        image.style.backgroundImage = '';
        container.style.display = 'block';
      }
    };

    window.BZFD.Util.setupProgressiveImages();

  }());
</script>
